title: SO I HAVE TO WIN PROMOS TWICE??

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
so basically i reached my plat 4 promos, won them with 2/3 wins and then at the end of the game it says "Congratulations you have qualified for promos!". Wait! What??!! I just won my promos.....wtf?? as proof i took pictures of my match history. it shows i had a win streak of 6, which undeniably, im gonna be in promos, then one loss, then 2 wins after that meaning promos won. i hit promos after that rengar win


im not sure how imgur works but i posted the link or whatever.

im not incredibly bothered by this, i mean im gonna play those promos again anyways because i have nothing better to do with my life but i thought i should just put it out there, it could potentially be an indicator of a glitch or a fault in the servers and whatever which may be of concern for riot..

replies.body: I often see this being reported if a dodge happened. Any dodges during promos instantly counts as a loss in your promos and can be the cause of you falling out of promos before qualifying again. Can you provide [an exact link](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/) to the match that you qualified for promos on?
in the 2nd and 3rd imgur pics its the rengar win i hit promos on. i dunno how i can send a link or anything but look me up im m411solstormer on EUW

I took a look at your account and it seems both times you entered your miniseries, the system registered a dodge, which counted as a loss and ended your series. 

If these were unintentional dodges, let me know so we can investigate connection issues that could cause these to happen.

ah that could be it actually thinking about it now. usually when i minimise league it will pop up when i have a game or if its my turn to pick or ban but twice i remember it not popping up for a while and on opening i was at the start screen. kek
btw the imgur pic is a bit cropped but there is a xerath win at the very bottom
